results.name: Triangle read by rows, Mobius transform of A004736
comment: Row sums = A007438, Mobius transform of the triangular numbers.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A054525 * A004736. A054525 = the Mobius transform, A004736 = the natural number "decrescendo" triangle: (1; 2,1; 3,2,1;...)
